rationale: The hamburger is an iconic American food. When you combine America (USA) with beef steak, you get a classic American hamburger!
Bees live in hives (bee houses) where they store the honey they produce. So a bee plus its home equals honey.
Rain forms when water droplets gather in clouds and become heavy enough to fall. So clouds plus water drops equal rain.
An axe is the traditional tool used to chop down trees to get wood. When you use an axe on a tree, you get logs of wood.
Thread and needle are the basic tools used in sewing to create clothing. When you sew with thread and a needle, you can make a shirt.
